page.title: 14Religious observance
page.content: The parish church (Church of England) is the most well attended closely followed by the Catholic church. {Morning services}are the most popular and many couples still choose to get {married}in church.{Burials}are less frequent than{cremation.}Both churches offer outings, study classes, Sunday schools and holiday activities for children. Church attendance and religious observance have{declined}in recent years. Schools are holding fewer{religious assemblies}and more events are held on a Sunday and more shops are open. However there are signs of change. Small{fundamentalist groups attract members and the{Quaker group is swelled through links with the{Campaign for Nuclear Disarmament. Church-affiliated groups like the {Mothers' Union}are more politically active (eg in opposing abortion).
